00020     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00021         const size_t images = 5;
00022         const size_t timesteps = 10;
00023 
00024         for ( size_t i = 0; i < timesteps; i++ ) {
00025             for ( size_t c = 0; c < images; c++ ) {
00026 
00027                 data::MemChunk<uint8_t> ch( 50, 50, 50 );
00028                 ch.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4( 1, 2, 3 ) );
00029                 ch.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( "acquisitionNumber", i );
00030                 ch.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( "sequenceNumber", c );
00031                 ch.setPropertyAs( "performingPhysician", std::string( "Dr. Jon Doe" ) );
00032                 ch.setPropertyAs( "rowVec", util::fvector4(   ( float )1 / sqrtf( 2 ), ( float )1 / sqrtf( 2 ) ) ); //rotated by pi/4 (45Â°)
00033                 ch.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( ( float ) - 1 / sqrtf( 2 ), ( float )1 / sqrtf( 2 ) ) );
00034                 ch.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", util::fvector4( 0, 0, 1 ) );
00035                 ch.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", util::fvector4( 1, 2, 3 ) );
00036                 ch.setPropertyAs( "repetitionTime", 1234 );
00037 
00038                 for ( int x = 10; x < 40; x++ )
00039                     for ( int y = 10; y < 40; y++ )
00040                         for ( int z = 0; z < 40; z++ )
00041                             ch.voxel<uint8_t>( x, y, z ) = 255 - i * 20;
00042 
00043                 ch.voxel<uint8_t>( 0, 0 ) = c * 40;
00044                 chunks.push_back( ch );
00045             }
00046         }
00047 
00048         return timesteps * images;;
00049     }
00050 
00051     void write( const data::Image &image, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )  throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00052         if ( image.getSizeAsVector() != util::fvector4( 50, 50, 50, 10 ) )
00053             throw( std::runtime_error( "Size mismatch (" + image.getSizeAsString() + "!=" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( util::fvector4( 50, 50, 50, 10 ) ) + ")" ) );
00054 
00055         const int snum = image.getPropertyAs<int32_t>( "sequenceNumber" );
00056 
00057         for ( int i = 0; i < 10; i++ )
00058             if ( image.voxel<uint8_t>( 0, 0 ) != snum )
00059                 throw( std::runtime_error( "Data mismatch" ) );
00060     }
00061     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
